Game Information:  
The first adventure game from Tim Schafer for the last sixteen years,
Broken Age was born two years ago during a record Kickstarter-campaign.
Now it's here - and it is beautiful, in 2D, in all its glory hand painted with a
unique orchestral music and star cast of actors. Broken Age - timeless story
about growing up, and talking trees toshnotno spoons. Vella Tartine and
Shay Volta - two teenagers trapped in a remarkably similar situations,
but radically different worlds. The player can freely switch between the
two stories, helping them deal with their own destinies and upcoming
adventures. They say that the genre of adventure games died, but then
Broken Age broke his fist and grabbed gravestone you right hand while
you're in this momment cried just like in the end of the movie "Carrie",
except that the words were: "I'm so I love adventure games! "And yes,
I'm sorry if we told you the ending of" Carrie. "


Repack Features:
